        public static java.lang.String getOrxFilePathByOrxName(java.lang.String orxName)
        Returns the full path to the .orx file specified by orxName.

        Returns:
        the full path to the .orx file specified by orxName.

      • getOrxFilePathByOrxName

        public static java.lang.String getOrxFilePathByOrxName(java.lang.String orxName,
                                                       boolean isDataBase)
        Returns the full path to the .orx file specified by orxName.
        Parameters:
        orxName - the name of a schema file (.orx).
        isDataBase - if set to true will assume that the orx is found in the "org" folder,
        if false will assume that the orx is found in the "lod" folder.
        Returns:
        the full path to the .orx file specified by orxName.

      • hasDvxFile

        public static boolean hasDvxFile(java.lang.String dvxName)
        Returns true if the given view (dvx name) is found in the views (dvx) folder.
        Parameters:
        dvxName - the name of a view file (.dvx).
        Returns:
        true if the given view (dvx name) is found in the views (dvx) folder, returns false otherwise.
